description: Updates data for the resource. To have the latest information, it must be preceded by a  DescribeResource call. The dataset in the request should be the one expected when performing another DescribeResource call.

parameters.name: OrganizationId
parameters.description: The identifier associated with the organization for which the resource is updated.

parameters.name: ResourceId
parameters.description: The identifier of the resource to be updated. The identifier can accept ResourceId, Resourcename, or email. The following identity formats are available: Resource ID: r-0123456789a0123456789b0123456789 Email address: resource@domain.tld Resource name: resource.

parameters.name: BookingOptions
parameters.description: The resource's booking options to be updated. AutoAcceptRequests (boolean) --- The resource's ability to automatically reply to requests. If disabled, delegates must be associated to the resource. AutoDeclineRecurringRequests (boolean) --- The resource's ability to automatically decline any recurring requests. AutoDeclineConflictingRequests (boolean) --- The resource's ability to automatically decline any conflicting requests.

nested_params.name: AutoAcceptRequests
nested_params.description: The resource's ability to automatically reply to requests. If disabled, delegates must be associated to the resource.

nested_params.name: AutoDeclineRecurringRequests
nested_params.description: The resource's ability to automatically decline any recurring requests.

nested_params.name: AutoDeclineConflictingRequests
nested_params.description: The resource's ability to automatically decline any conflicting requests.
